Body: Good idea putting more recourses into cyber security. The last thing we need right now is a leak.
I don't get why you had to make a donation. We ARE NOT a charity, we are a business. Start acting like it.
I like what you did with showing others users data to increase the UX of our clients... and that chunk of change wont hurt either ;)
The Swamp mech is ready to develop, are team has been hard at work to get this done in time...
